alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Pinal County; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 8:24AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 900 AM MST... At 823 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goodyear, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Laveen, Cashion, Sun City, Litchfield Park, White Tank Mountain Park, South Phoenix, Liberty and South Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 107 and 143. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 197 and 201. US Highway 60 between mile markers 132 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Pinal County; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
